datasources.name: Sales Analytics DB
datasources.definition: Comprehensive sales data warehouse containing transactional records, customer information, and product performance metrics from 2020 to present.

attributes.name: revenue
attributes.description: Total revenue generated from the transaction

attributes.name: region
attributes.description: Geographic region where the sale occurred

datasources.name: Marketing Campaign DB
datasources.definition: Marketing campaign performance data including ad spend, impressions, clicks, conversions, and ROI metrics across all channels.

attributes.name: campaign_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for each marketing campaign

attributes.name: channel
attributes.description: Marketing channel (e.g., Email, Social Media, PPC)

attributes.name: ad_spend
attributes.description: Total amount spent on the campaign

attributes.name: impressions
attributes.description: Number of times the ad was displayed

attributes.name: clicks
attributes.description: Number of clicks on the ad

datasources.name: Customer Behavior DB
datasources.definition: Customer interaction and behavioral data including website visits, engagement metrics, purchase history, and customer satisfaction scores.

attributes.name: session_duration
attributes.description: Duration of the user session in seconds

attributes.name: pages_viewed
attributes.description: Number of pages viewed during the session
